abstract: Saudi Arabia’s Specialized Criminal Court sentences Abdel-Karim al-Khadar, Islamic studies professor who criticized religious extremism and is outspoken supporter of women’s rights, to 10 years in prison; al-Khadar is third activist given prison sentence in past week.
lead_paragraph: Abdel-Karim al-Khadar, a professor of Islamic studies from conservative Qassim Province, is considered among the most vocal critics of religious extremism and militancy.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: Activist Professor Gets 10-Year Sentence
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Saudi Arabia: Activist Professor Gets 10-Year Sentence

snippet: Abdel-Karim al-Khadar, a professor of Islamic studies from conservative Qassim Province, is considered among the most vocal critics of religious extremism and militancy.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
